content: labubu cardigan shorthand key k=knit p=purl k1m1=knit through the back loop increase pm=place marker sm=slip marker k2p2=knit 2 purl 2 ribbing cast on 36 stitches on us size 2 needles with sock or 1 light yarn 1 knit 4 place marker k 8 pm k12 pm k8 pm k4 2 purl 3 k1 k1m1 k to 1 before mark k1mk1 sm k1m1 k to 1 before mark k1m1 sm k1m1 k to 1 before mark k1m1 sm k1m1 knit to 1 before mark k1m1 sm k1m1 k to last 3 k1m1 k2 4 p 5 k to 1 before mark k1m1 sm k1m1 k to mark k1m1 sm k1m1 k to 1 before mark k1m1 sm k1m1 knit to 1 before mark k1m1 sm k1m1 k to end 6 p 7 repeat 3 8 p 9 repeat 5 10 p 68 stitches if you have a very fat labubu you can repeat 3 each time instead of alternating between 3 and 5 to add 4 more stitches to the front of cardigan separating sleeves k to mark remove mark and place sleeve stitches on hold with scrap yarn cast on 6 st knit to mark cast on 6 st place sleeve stitches on hold with scrap knit knit in stockinette for 5 more row knit in kn2p2 rib for 6 row cast off in pattern sleeves knit with dpns or magic loop pick up 3 stitches in the middle of cast on knit the stitches on hold pick up last 3 stitches from cast on 22 stitches will be on needle 11 per side if using magic loop knit in slip_stitch for 3 row if you labubu has very short arms decrease to 2 row knit in k2 p2 rib for 3 row cast off in pattern collar pick up 2 stitches for every 3 stitches around front pick up every stitch around original cast on edge pick up 2 stitches for every 3 stitches around other side of front k2p2 rib for 4 row cast off in pattern you can make tiny 1 row button holes on row 2 or sew in snaps inside and make faux buttons from felt or embroidery floss
